data.name: Stature
data.description: The daughter of Ant-Man, Stature uses her Pym Tech to grow to great heights, drawing fire and stomping down enemy defenses.

starItems.name: Stature
starItems.description: The daughter of Ant-Man, Stature uses her Pym Tech to grow to great heights, drawing fire and stomping down enemy defenses.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and  <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> or <color=#fff568>HERO BIO</color> ally

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> or <color=#fff568>HERO BIO</color> ally.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> or <color=#fff568>HERO BIO</color> ally.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> or <color=#fff568>HERO BIO</color> ally.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> or <color=#fff568>HERO BIO</color> ally.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
Ability now costs <color=#86e619>3</color> Ability Energy
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage.
Gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> + <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> + <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>1</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally or self.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies or self

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies or self.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies or self.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies or self

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage.
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies or self.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage.
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies or self.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage.
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>3</color> random <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies or self.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.
Generate <color=#86e619>2</color> Ability Energy for all <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies and self.

1.description:
When a <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that ally, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from self. If Ant-Man is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>, to Ant-Man.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
1.nextUpgrade: When a <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>

2.description:
When a <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that ally, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>. Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from self. If Ant-Man is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>, to Ant-Man.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Focus.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for self and <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self and <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies

3.description:
When a <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that ally, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>. Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from self. If Ant-Man is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>, to Ant-Man.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.

In <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self and <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
Fill Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>10%</color>
If Ant-Man is an ally when this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>, to Ant-Man

4.description:
When a <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that ally, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>. Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from self. If Ant-Man is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>, to Ant-Man.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Focus.

In <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self and <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus for self and <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health for self and <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies

5.description:
When a <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to that ally, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>. Fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from self. If Ant-Man is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>4</color>, to Ant-Man.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus. <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Focus.

In <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health for self and <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies.
